metadata.dc:author: Samolski, Daniel
Castillo Villegas, Diego
Martín Robles, Irene
metadata.dc:description: The Clinical Notes published in 2009 serve as a resource to reflect on clinical aspects relevant to different clinical entities. Through this review an attempt is likewise made to bring the reader closer to the clinical reality of our environment.
metadata.dc:title: La clínica vista a través de Archivos: las notas clínicas del 2009.
[The clinical view through the Archives: the clinical notes of 2009].
